name: Who Let the Critters Out?!
description:
CONTROLS: Move: Arrow Keys Select: Space Bar Menus: Mouse You're a small bat visiting the beach with all your friends. Your pal Bingo asked if you can help pass out watermelon slices to everyone but there are obstacles and enemies blocking you!
  • Special Thanks: 
    • Francesca Carletto-Leon (@ceschiii)
    • Unity Technology for their Creator Kit: RPG
  • Banner Illustration: Anna Cheng (@qiabata)
  • Background Music: BEACHBRAT and MFYM
  • SFX Clips: Suntemple and Mellau
